## Activity: Find Your Data Sources

In pairs, come up with a data context and broad research questions.

Find online as many of the following as you can related to your data context:

- Clean tabular datasets, e.g. kaggle or tidytuesday
- Messy or non-tabular datasets, e.g. JSONs or tables on a webpage
- API sources
